mapper.select: SELECT A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_TITLE, A.REQ_CON, A.SYS_INFO_NM, A.REQ_TYPE, A.REQ_DTTM, A.REQ_END_DTTM, B.CLEAR_ST_DTTM, B.CLEAR_DUE_DTTM FROM SR_REQ A,SR_CLEAR B WHERE A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND B.CLEAR_CON IS NOT NULL AND B.USER_ID = #{user}
